# 31st Bachsas Awards

The 31st Bachsas Awards were given by Bangladesh Cholochitra Sangbadik Samity (Bangladesh Cine-Journalists' Association) to outstanding performers of the silver screen, small screen, music, dance and theatre in 2012. Awards was introduced in 1972 to encourage the fledgling film industry of the country.
List of winners
Lifetime Achievement Awards
* Nayok Raj Razzak
* Sarah Begum Kobori
* Chashi Nazrul Islam
